Text: I can understand why very few humans would have the patience or tolerance to read out loud the ramblings of yet another "Jewish threat" conspiracy theorist. Intolerance and plain bloody mindedness have probably been around for at least 5000 years too. Just think...25 years sitting at home, plucking the fluff out of ones own navel...enough to make anyone wacko!

Knowledge is power - so better learn sooner than later what's going on around the world!!!

And you are right too - a lot of crap have been propagated through many thousands of years, but unfortunately most of decent info was wiped out from history by those wackos in charge (read the book) so not many sources are widely available.

This has been proven a forgery.. Just some crap made up and used to incite hate and violence against a minority.. A quick wikipedia search can back that up....

Really sad how gullible some people are

You probably thought about "Protocols ..." when you mentioned about forgery. First answer check Swiss court case that forgery was used in terms of document submitted to court and not validity of original discussed (which was "forged" and original did not reach the court).

And Mullins is guy they want to erase. Have you ever heard about Ezra Pound? - if not than DO YOUR homework boy, get lost, and after you may get your lolipop!
And Wikipedia generally is as good as toilet paper. Do you want to read communistic encyclopaedia - just like wikipedia and it happens that I have a copy.

And warning for Ploni and others who may try to be hidden - each and every of you will be tracked and prosecuted for anything done wrong (including internet crime and dissemination of inter-racial hatred).

UNDERSTOOD???

You cannot track me, but I bet I can track you.
So better behave like it is normally understood in international community.

Minority or majority - YOU WILL BE PROSECUTED !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
